title: Looking for an adc main to duo with (currently gold 4)
body:
Not really looking for a serious climb, just wanting to have fun in games which we may or may not climb in. 
I'm happy to play a wide range of supports (probably mainly mages), and I'll usually be on after around 5pm most days.

I'm just here to have fun, and if you'd like to join me, feel free to add me (ign Masterzimmybuddy)
